title: [Question] Having less than 80% in 12th boards is how much of a problem during cse placements?
content:
same as title   
I have 77% in 12th boards and 92 in 10th   
how many companies will I won't be eligible to sit during placements?

comments.body: <5% of companies ask for 12th board. and these companies are usually t2 or t3 , you will be eligible for almost all with just a good CGPA.
What can be considered as a good CGPA?
8.75+ is safest , 8 is also good (for being eligible  for all companies)
ok so w 8 will be be eligible for most companies?
Refer to the FAQs. It's been answered already
